meanings.sent1: The biconcavities of the red blood cells help them move through tiny blood vessels.
meanings.sent2: Scientists studied the biconcavities of the lens to understand its focusing ability.
meanings.sent3: The biconcavities of the jellyfish made it look like a floating umbrella.
meanings.sent4: The biconcavities of the mirror reflected the light in all directions.
meanings.sent5: The biconcavities of the coin made it easy to distinguish from a counterfeit.
